data.proxyObjectName: transparent plastic ruler with silver markings
data.utilizationMethod: Place one palm on the flat ruler and slide it forward along the desk

data.proxyObjectName: individually wrapped snack bar in clear plastic
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the bar length-wise between thumb and fingers and press gently along its sides

data.proxyObjectName: black-and-white patterned umbrella with curved handle
data.utilizationMethod: Slip fingers around the curved handle, thumb on top, raise umbrella slightly and pivot wrist to simulate mug rotation.
Hold the fan’s neck just above the base with your dominant hand, cup the other hand under the head, and swing the fan forward like a head-heavy tool.
Wrap fingers around the neck of the bottle below the trigger and swing the heavier fluid-filled base forward to tap it on the shelf

data.proxyObjectName: flathead screwdriver with a red transparent handle
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the handle fully, extend your index finger along the shaft, and cut the air inward in semicircular motions
